tool_description: Classifies customer data by sensitivity level and regulatory requirements for proper handling during export or deletion.

data_locations.description: List of data locations to classify

regulation_framework.description: Regulatory framework to apply: GDPR, CCPA, PIPEDA, or LGPD

include_metadata.description: Whether to include metadata in classification

error_messages: Unsupported regulation framework: Use one of [GDPR, CCPA, PIPEDA, LGPD].
Data location not accessible: One or more specified data locations cannot be accessed.
Classification failed: Unable to classify data due to format or permission issues.
Empty data locations: At least one data location must be provided.
usage: Provide customer_id, data_locations from discovery tool, and appropriate regulation_framework. Set include_metadata to control detail level. Returns classified data categories with sensitivity levels.

classification_results.description: List of data classifications with sensitivity levels

processing_notes.description: Special handling requirements for each data type
